content:
You can check your playtime in Assassin's Creed Odyssey on various platforms:

**PS4:**

1. Go to the PS4's Home screen.
2. Highlight the Assassin's Creed Odyssey game icon.
3. Press the Options button (Share button) on your controller.
4. Select "Information" from the menu.
5. Scroll down to "Playtime" to see the total hours played.

**Xbox One:**

1. Go to the Xbox One's Home screen.
2. Highlight the Assassin's Creed Odyssey game tile.
3. Press the Menu button (three horizontal lines) on your controller.
4. Select "Details" from the menu.
5. Scroll down to "Playtime" to see the total hours played.

**PC (Uplay):**

1. Launch the Uplay client on your PC.
2. Click on the "Games" tab.
3. Find Assassin's Creed Odyssey in your game library.
4. Click on the "i" icon next to the game's title.
5. In the game's details page, you'll find the "Playtime" section, which displays the total hours played.

**Ubisoft Connect:**

1. Open the Ubisoft Connect app on your platform (PC, PS4, or Xbox One).
2. Sign in with your Ubisoft account.
3. Go to the "Games" tab.
4. Find Assassin's Creed Odyssey in your game library.
5. Click on the game's title to access its details page.
6. Scroll down to the "Stats" section, where you'll find your total playtime.

Check your playtime and see how many hours you've invested in Assassin's Creed Odyssey since November 20th!
